name: GHA Monorepo Matrix + Turbo + pnpm
description: Matrix by package with pnpm and Turbo cache.

files.template:
name: Monorepo Matrix

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        pkg: ['packages/a', 'packages/b']
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
        with:
          version: 9
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'pnpm'
      - run: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
      - run: npm i -g turbo
      - run: turbo run build --filter=\${{ matrix.pkg }}
        env:
          TURBO_TOKEN: \${{ secrets.TURBO_TOKEN }}
          TURBO_TEAM: \${{ secrets.TURBO_TEAM }}
